column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Bolin says : " So let me ask you about metalbending .
#Text=Even blockheads like you can figure it out with the right instruction .
#Text=" Lin says : " Yeah , you 're a real sensitive instructor .
#Text=" Bolin says : " I did learn how to lavabend .
#Text=" Toph says : " Really ?
#Text=It 's a very rare ability .
#Text=Maybe you do have some talent .
#Text=" Bolin says : " I ca n't believe ... you think I 'm talented ?
#Text=That means so much to me coming from my hero .
#Text=" Lin says : " Yeah , she 's real encouraging .
#Text=" Toph says : " Hey !
#Text=I 'm blind , not deaf .
#Text=" Bolin says : " So here 's something I 've always been curious about : Who 's Lin 's dad ?
#Text=" Toph says : " He was a guy named Kanto .
#Text=Nice man , but it did n't really work out between us .
#Text=" Bolin says : " And ... okay .
#Text=" Toph says : " Lin , I can feel your enraged breathing from here .
#Text=Just say what you have to say and let 's get it over with .
#Text=" Lin says : " Just get it over with ?
#Text=Yeah , let 's not linger on the fact that I grew up without a dad .
#Text=No need to get all touchy - feely about it .
#Text=Just one of those things , right ?
#Text=" Toph says : " Hey , I forgave you for all your garbage a long time ago and Su and I worked things out .
#Text=You 're the only one who wants to hold on to this family drama nonsense for the rest of your life .
#Text=" Lin says : " Forgave me for what ?!
#Text=And not knowing my dad is nonsense to you ?
#Text=It was pretty important to me .
#Text=And until now , you would never even discuss it .
#Text=You know , after Su and I patched things up , I thought , " maybe I should try to reach out to mom . "
#Text=But now that we 're together again , I remember why we stopped talking .
#Text=You make me furious and you do n't even know why .
#Text=And when I tell you , you do n't care .
#Text=Once we save Su , you and I are finished .
#Text=" Toph says : " If that 's your decision and it makes you happy , then fine .
#Text=" Opal says : " The test is about to start .
#Text=They 're going to blow up that empty town we flew over yesterday .
#Text=You 're clear to go .
#Text=" Lin says : " Copy that .
#Text=We 're clear to go .
#Text="
